mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE_BOARD N JOIN NOTICE_CATEGORY C ON N.N_CTG_NO= C.N_CTG_NO WHERE APT_NO = (SELECT APT_NO FROM HOUSEHOLD_INFO WHERE HOUSEHOLD_CODE = #{householdCode})
AND ${searchCondition} like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT N.*, ROWNUM as RNUM FROM ( SELECT M.* from ( SELECT NOTICE_NO ,N_CTG_NO ,(SELECT N_CTG_NAME FROM NOTICE_CATEGORY B WHERE B.N_CTG_NO = A.N_CTG_NO) AS N_CTG_NAME ,NOTICE_TITLE ,NOTICE_CONTENT ,NOTICE_REGDATE ,MEMBER_NO ,(SELECT MEMBER_NAME FROM MEMBER_INFO C WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO) AS MEMBER_NAME ,(SELECT SCD_NO FROM SCHEDULER S WHERE A.NOTICE_NO = S.NOTICE_NO) AS SCD_NO ,(SELECT SCD_CONTENT FROM SCHEDULER S WHERE A.NOTICE_NO = S.NOTICE_NO) AS SCD_CONTENT ,APT_NO ,(SELECT N_STORAGE_NO FROM NOTICE_STORAGE F WHERE A.NOTICE_NO = F.NOTICE_NO) AS N_STORAGE_NO ,(SELECT NOTICE_ORIGINAL_FILENAME FROM NOTICE_STORAGE F WHERE A.NOTICE_NO = F.NOTICE_NO) AS NOTICE_ORIGINAL_FILENAME ,(SELECT NOTICE_FILENAME FROM NOTICE_STORAGE F WHERE A.NOTICE_NO = F.NOTICE_NO) AS NOTICE_FILENAME ,(SELECT NOTICE_FILESIZE FROM NOTICE_STORAGE F WHERE A.NOTICE_NO = F.NOTICE_NO) AS NOTICE_FILESIZE FROM NOTICE_BOARD A WHERE APT_NO = (SELECT APT_NO FROM HOUSEHOLD_INFO WHERE HOUSEHOLD_CODE = #{householdCode}) ) M
WHERE ${searchCondition} like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC )N )
WHERE RNUM > #{firstRecordIndex} AND RNUM <= #{firstRecordIndex} + #{recordCountPerPage}

SELECT A.NOTICE_NO ,A.N_CTG_NO ,(SELECT N_CTG_NAME FROM NOTICE_CATEGORY B WHERE B.N_CTG_NO = A.N_CTG_NO) AS N_CTG_NAME ,A.NOTICE_TITLE ,A.NOTICE_CONTENT ,A.NOTICE_REGDATE ,A.MEMBER_NO ,(SELECT MEMBER_NAME FROM MEMBER_INFO C WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO) AS MEMBER_NAME ,A.APT_NO ,S.SCD_NO ,S.SCD_CONTENT ,S.SCD_S_DATE as START_DATE ,S.SCD_E_DATE as END_DATE ,(SELECT N_STORAGE_NO FROM NOTICE_STORAGE F WHERE A.NOTICE_NO = F.NOTICE_NO) AS N_STORAGE_NO ,(SELECT NOTICE_ORIGINAL_FILENAME FROM NOTICE_STORAGE F WHERE A.NOTICE_NO = F.NOTICE_NO) AS NOTICE_ORIGINAL_FILENAME ,(SELECT NOTICE_FILENAME FROM NOTICE_STORAGE F WHERE A.NOTICE_NO = F.NOTICE_NO) AS NOTICE_FILENAME ,(SELECT NOTICE_FILESIZE FROM NOTICE_STORAGE F WHERE A.NOTICE_NO = F.NOTICE_NO) AS NOTICE_FILESIZE FROM NOTICE_BOARD A, SCHEDULER S WHERE A.NOTICE_NO = S.NOTICE_NO(+) AND A.NOTICE_NO= #{noticeNo}
SELECT * FROM NOTICE_STORAGE WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo} ORDER BY N_STORAGE_NO DESC

SELECT SCD_NO ,SCD_CONTENT ,SCD_S_DATE as START_DATE ,SCD_E_DATE+1 as END_DATE ,NOTICE_NO ,APT_NO FROM SCHEDULER WHERE APT_NO = (SELECT APT_NO FROM HOUSEHOLD_INFO WHERE HOUSEHOLD_CODE = #{householdCode})
AND TO_CHAR(SCD_S_DATE ,'YYYY-MM') <= #{searchMonth} AND TO_CHAR(SCD_E_DATE ,'YYYY-MM') >= #{searchMonth}
